attributes.action: Terrorism has no religion, separate Terrorism from Islam.
attributes.additional_details: Hate and fear is growing in all communities, let us end this.
attributes.background: No religion teaches or promotes Terrorism. Associating Terrorism with religion causes distress among millions of people for the acts of a few who misinterpret religious text. It puts people of all religions in danger, horrendous crimes have been carried out against innocent citizens.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
